title: Australia's Best: Music & Images of Australians in the 80's
creator_credit: Pom Oliver, New South Wales Film Corporation and South Pacific Films
brief_description: A music video documentary showcasing the best of Australia’s popular music in the eighties. Features the music of Split Enz, Australian Crawl, INXS, No Fixed Address, Cold Chisel and Icehouse. Includes interviews with celebrities such as Michael Hutchence, Neil and Tim Finn, James Reyne and Grace Knight.
